title: 'The top sheet is plastic'

title: 'Good Sanitary Pads'
body: I have been using this product for about a month now and e feel I have used it enough to give a fair review. The pads are a great deal for the price you pay to begin with. The packet has 30 pads for under ‚Çπ150 ( ‚Çπ139 to be precise). The size that I bought is medium 280mm or 28cm (true to its claim). They are thin and you wouldn't even feel like you have them on. They are well absorbant and doesn't irritate the skin. The cotton doesn't gather in between. The onky thing that I thought could have been done was that it could have had double wings; as in it could have stickable wings at the back as well so it would remain intact. Over-all I could say that I would highly recommend this one so ling as they don't greedily hike their price.
